timeline.message:
Four unmapped top level classes

Signed-off-by: liach <liach@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Is this a util class or an actual data fix?
If it's a util class it should go in util package.
timeline.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: A utility array that is only used by data fix. Hmm no other such helper object exist in fix package, sure
replies.author: liach
